fontFamilies.name: Monospace
fontFamilies.fontFamily: Consolas,Menlo,Monaco,"SF Mono","DejaVu Sans Mono","Roboto Mono","Courier New",Courier,monospace

core/navigation.css: & .wp-block-navigation-item:hover > a, & a:hover, & a:active, & .current-menu-item > a { text-decoration: underline; text-decoration-style: solid; text-decoration-thickness: 3px; text-underline-offset: 4px; }

core/query-title.css: &.lemon-rotated-title { writing-mode: vertical-rl; transform: rotate(180deg); white-space: nowrap; font-size: clamp(3rem, 10vw + 1rem, 12rem) !important; line-height: 0.8; }

yoast/faq-block.css: & .schema-faq-section { background: var(--wp--preset--color--secondary); color: var(--wp--preset--color--base); padding: 8px 4px 8px 32px; margin: 4px 0;} & .schema-faq-answer{line-height: inherit; margin: 0;}

lemon-concentrate/ticker.css: height: 130px; font-size: 2.25rem; display: flex; align-items: center; font-weight: 500;

lemon-concentrate/product-category-loop.css: .lemon-concentrate-category-item { position: relative; overflow: hidden; } .lemon-concentrate-category-item::before { content: ''; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.15'/%3E%3C/svg%3E"); pointer-events: none; z-index: 1; mix-blend-mode: overlay; } .lemon-concentrate-category-name { font-weight: 500; }

lemon-concentrate/mega-menu.css: &.is-style-underline .lemon-mega-menu-nav { border: none !important; } &.is-style-underline .lemon-mega-menu-nav a { border-radius: 999px !important; margin: 0 2px; transition: all 0.3s ease; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; } &.is-style-underline .lemon-mega-menu-nav a:hover, &.is-style-underline .lemon-mega-menu-nav .current-menu-item > a { text-decoration: none; background-color: var(--wp--preset--color--secondary); color: var(--wp--preset--color--primary); }

styles.css: a, button, .wp-block-button__link, input[type="submit"], input[type="button"], .clickable { cursor: none; } .sidebar{ background: var(--wp--preset--color--primary); border-radius: 4px;} /* Home Page: Fixed & Transparent */ body.home header.wp-block-template-part { position: fixed !important; top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; z-index: 1000; width: 100%; min-height: 120px; transition: padding 0.3s ease, background-color 0.3s ease; background-color: transparent; } body.home header.wp-block-template-part.is-scrolled { background-color: var(--wp--preset--color--base); padding-top: 0 !important; padding-bottom: 0 !important; min-height: 80px; box-shadow: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06); } /* Product & Category: Sticky & Dynamic Color */ body:is(.tax-product_category, .single-lemon_product, .post-type-archive-lemon_product) header.wp-block-template-part { position: sticky !important; top: 0; z-index: 1000; width: 100%; transition: padding 0.3s ease, background-color 0.3s ease; background-color: var(--category-color, #ffffff) !important; } body:is(.tax-product_category, .single-lemon_product, .post-type-archive-lemon_product) header.wp-block-template-part.is-scrolled { background-color: var(--wp--preset--color--base) !important; padding-top: 0 !important; padding-bottom: 0 !important; box-shadow: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06); } /* Logo Transitions */ body:is(.home, .tax-product_category, .single-lemon_product, .post-type-archive-lemon_product) header.wp-block-template-part .custom-logo { transition: width 0.3s ease, max-width 0.3s ease; } body:is(.home, .tax-product_category, .single-lemon_product, .post-type-archive-lemon_product) header.wp-block-template-part.is-scrolled .custom-logo { width: 100px !important; max-width: 100px !important; } /* Button Transitions */ body:is(.home, .tax-product_category, .single-lemon_product, .post-type-archive-lemon_product) header.wp-block-template-part .wp-block-button__link { transition: padding 0.3s ease, font-size 0.3s ease; } body:is(.home, .tax-product_category, .single-lemon_product, .post-type-archive-lemon_product) header.wp-block-template-part.is-scrolled .wp-block-button__link { padding-top: 12px !important; padding-bottom: 12px !important; font-size: 14px !important; } /* Admin Bar */ body:is(.home, .tax-product_category, .single-lemon_product, .post-type-archive-lemon_product).admin-bar header.wp-block-template-part { top: 32px; } @media screen and (max-width: 782px) { body:is(.home, .tax-product_category, .single-lemon_product, .post-type-archive-lemon_product).admin-bar header.wp-block-template-part { top: 46px; } } /* Main Content Padding */ body:is(.home, .tax-product_category, .single-lemon_product, .post-type-archive-lemon_product) main.wp-block-group { padding-top: 0 !important; margin-top: 0 !important; } body:is(.home, .tax-product_category, .single-lemon_product, .post-type-archive-lemon_product) .wp-site-blocks > header + * { margin-top: 0 !important; } .custom-cursor { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 10px; height: 10px; background-color: var(--wp--preset--color--base); border-radius: 50%; pointer-events: none; z-index: 9999; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); transition: width 0.2s ease, height 0.2s ease, background-color 0.2s ease, opacity 0.2s ease; mix-blend-mode: difference; opacity: 0; } .custom-cursor.is-expanded { width: 50px; height: 50px; background-color: var(--wp--preset--color--secondary); opacity: 0.6; mix-blend-mode: normal; } @media (hover: none) { .custom-cursor { display: none; } a, button, .wp-block-button__link, input[type="submit"], input[type="button"], .clickable { cursor: auto; } } :where(.wp-block-search__button-inside .wp-block-search__inside-wrapper) .wp-block-search__input { border: none; padding: 0 15px; } .lemon-concentrate-breadcrumbs-icon svg { max-width: 20px; height: auto; } .lemon-concentrate-breadcrumbs-icon { line-height: 0; } .wp-block-columns { gap: var(--wp--preset--spacing--50); } .wp-block-column { margin-bottom: 0; } .wp-block-lemon-concentrate-mobile-menu { display: none; } .wp-block-lemon-concentrate-mobile-menu.is-always-visible { display: block !important; } @media (max-width: 1280px) { header.wp-block-template-part .wp-block-navigation, header.wp-block-template-part .wp-block-buttons, header.wp-block-template-part .menu, header.wp-block-template-part .contact-us, header.wp-block-template-part .wp-block-lemon-concentrate-mega-menu { display: none !important; } header.wp-block-template-part .lemon-mobile-menu .wp-block-navigation, header.wp-block-template-part .lemon-mobile-menu .wp-block-buttons { display: flex !important; } header.wp-block-template-part .wp-block-lemon-concentrate-mobile-menu { display: block !important; } header.wp-block-template-part .custom-logo { max-width: 130px !important; width: 130px !important; height: auto !important; } body .wp-site-blocks > .wp-block-cover:first-of-type { min-height: 75vh !important; } } @media (min-width: 1281px) { header.wp-block-template-part .wp-block-navigation__responsive-container:not(.is-menu-open) { display: flex !important; } header.wp-block-template-part .wp-block-navigation__responsive-container-toggle { display: none !important; } } .wp-block-search { width: 100%; max-width: 750px; } .wp-block-site-logo img { height: auto; max-width: 80%; } .lemon-hero-post-content { text-align: center; padding-bottom: var(--wp--preset--spacing--60); } body.home .lemon-hero-post-content { padding-top: clamp(120px, 15vh, 180px); } .lemon-simple-menu, .lemon-simple-menu a { color: #C8C7CC; } .lemon-product h3 { min-height: 40px; } .lemon-contact-form-submit .wp-block-button__link { font-size: 1.1rem; background-color: #ffffff; border: 2px solid var(--category-color, var(--wp--preset--color--secondary)); color: var(--wp--preset--color--primary); } @media (max-width: 1280px) { .lemon-single-header-columns { flex-wrap: wrap !important; } .lemon-single-header-columns > .wp-block-column { flex-basis: 100% !important; padding-left: 0 !important; margin-left: 0 !important; } } .lemon-filter-toggle-btn { background: none; border: none; cursor: pointer; padding: 10px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; color: inherit; width: 100%; }
